## Skeleton PT Options

| Value | Label | Options | Description |
|:------|:------|:--------|:------------|
| **1** | **root** | instance: any<br/>props: SkeletonProps<br/>attrs: any<br/>parent: any<br/>global: undefined &#124; object | Used to pass attributes to the root's DOM element. |
| **2** | **hooks** | instance: any<br/>props: SkeletonProps<br/>attrs: any<br/>parent: any<br/>global: undefined &#124; object | Used to manage all lifecycle hooks. |
